bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for High Voltage Gas-Insulated Substations Rated Above 52 kV
IEEE Standard for High Voltage Gas-Insulated Substations Rated Above 52 kV
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.122-2010 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.122-1993)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation of a gas-insulated substations are covered. The parameters to be supplied by the purchaser are set, and the technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation details to be furnished by the manufacturer are established.

The technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation of a gasinsulated substations are covered. The parameters to be supplied by the purchaser are set, and the technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation details to be furnished by the manufacturer are established.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
